channel.title: Watch With Dvx.. look.. need help
channel.description:
I would like to know if anyone knows how to make the "Watch" thing on http://www.joox.net/stage6 . I would like to add it to my site but dont know how. So if someone could help me with this it would be much appreciated. I know you put this in my site [code]

[/code] with the css here - http://joox.net/stage6/style.css but then what do i do?

item.title: Watch With Dvx.. look.. need help
item.dc:creator: @Gtech_Warriors Gtech Warriors
item.description:
@Gtech_Warriors wrote:

no… look on the site - http://www.joox.net/stage6

see where it says watch… on their site u can watch any video off of http://stage6.divx.com/ on their site… by just entering the video ID or video url…

for example like if i wanted to watch this video on their site - http://stage6.divx.com/user/fouredin/video/1170851/Spiderman-3-FINAL-Trailer---HD-720 … i would just put the ID - 1170851 or video url - http://stage6.divx.com/user/fouredin/video/1170851/Spiderman-3-FINAL-Trailer---HD-720 … in the box and press “Watch” and it will play on their site…

I want that on my site…

Read full topic
